message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $140?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130.
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I need to make a bit more than $130. How about we meet in the middle at $137.50?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $127.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $127. How about we meet at $135?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125.
I'm starting to think you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway between $135 and $125, so how about we try $130?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. How about $126?
I'm not getting any younger, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $129?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. How about $128?
